Articles.Content:
Greetings, Pilots
The AirCombat Lite series of crafts are designed with minimum mod usage, using only on Airplane Plus for aesthetics and functional parts and BDArmory for armaments
Using minimum mods should help for users with less-advanced computers who can't put on 50+ mods or they'll melt their computers, also to ensure widespread use because some people just don't want to use certain mods
AirCombat Lite crafts are mainly based on US jet aircrafts, some are replica, some are not
Feel free to use these crafts as OPFOR to help you design and fine-tune your aircrafts
 


The Hangar

  • F-102 Auk - Download
    Spoiler

    F-102 Auk

    F-102 Auk is a lightweight single seat supersonic fighter-bomber in operation during the early 1960s
    Smaller and simpler than contemporaries such as the F-110 Mamba, the F-102 cost less to procure and operate, making it a popular export aircraft. Though primarily designed for a day air superiority role, the aircraft is also a capable ground-attack platform.

    Specification

    • Crew: 1
    • Length: 12.0m
    • Wingspan: 8.9m
    • Height: 4.2m
    • Empty Weight: 5,779kg
    • Loaded Weight: 10,436kg
    • Fuel capacity: 800 unit
    • Powerplant: 1x J-404 Panther afterburning turbofan
    • TWR: 0.83 dry / 1.27 wet

    Armament

    • Guns:
      • 4 × .50 M2 Browning Machine Gun, 300 rounds per gun

    Hardpoints: 5 - 1 centerline hardpoint and 4 wing hardpoints

    • Missiles:
      • 4x AIM-9 Sidewinder
    • Rockets:
      • 4x Hydra-19 Launcher
      • 4x S-8KOM Launcher
    • Bombs:
      • 5x Mk 82 bomb
      • 1x CBU-87 cluster munition
    • Others
      • 1x 100u drop tank
      • 1x 150u drop tank

    Avionics

    • AN/APG-63 Radar

     

 

  • F-107 Asp - Download
    Spoiler

    F-107 Asp

    The F-107 Asp is a lightweight jet aircraft, designed in the late 1960s to fulfill light attack / light fighter / advanced trainer roles

    Specification

    • Crew: 2
    • Length:
    • Wingspan:
    • Height:
    • Empty Weight:
    • Loaded Weight:
    • Fuel capacity: 600 unit
    • Powerplant: 2x
    • TWR: dry / wet

    Armament

    • Guns:
      • 2 × .50 M2 Browning Machine Gun, 600 rounds per gun

    Hardpoints: 5 - 1 centerline  hardpoint and 4 wing hardpoints

    • Missiles:
      • 4x AIM-9 Sidewinder
    • Rockets:
      • 4x Hydra-19 Launcher
      • 4x S-8KOM Launcher
    • Bombs:
      • 5x Mk 82 bomb
      • 3x CBU-87 cluster munition
    • Others
      • 1x 100u drop tank
      • 1x 150u drop tank

 

  • F-109 Adder - Download
    Spoiler

    F-109 Adder
    Fulfilling the Airforce’s needs of high speed fighter-interceptor armed with radar-guided missiles, the F-109 is also pressed into ground attack mission later in its service life

    Specification

    • Crew: 1
    • Length:
    • Wingspan:
    • Height:
    • Empty Weight:
    • Loaded Weight:
    • Fuel capacity: 800 unit
    • Powerplant: 1x
    • TWR: dry / wet

    Armament

    Guns:

    • 1x 20mm Vulcan, 650 rounds per gun

    Hardpoints: 5 with a capacity of – and provisions to carry combinations of:

    • Missiles:
      • 4x AIM-9 Sidewinder
      • 2x AIM-120 AMRAAM
    • Rockets:
      • 4x Hydra 19 rocket launcher
      • 4x S-8KOM rocket launcher
    • Bombs:
      • 1x MER with 6x Mk 82 on centreline hardpoint
    • Drop Tanks:
      • 1x 100u drop tank
      • 1x 150u drop tank

     

  • F-110E Mamba - Download
    Spoiler

    F-110E Mamba

    A dedicated aerial combat variant of F-110 series, the mamba has proven to be a capable interceptor and air superiority fighter

    Specification

    • Crew: 2
    • Length: 15,9m
    • Wingspan: 12,2m
    • Height: 4,8m
    • Empty Weight: 8,058kg
    • Loaded Weight: 17,655kg
    • Fuel capacity: 1600 unit
    • Powerplant: 2x J-404 afterburning turbofan
    • TWR: 0.98 dry / 1.50 wet

    Armament

    Guns:

    • 1x 20mm Vulcan, 650 rounds per gun

    Hardpoints: 11 with a capacity of – and provisions to carry combinations of:

    • Missiles:
      • 4x AIM-9 Sidewinder on dedicated launcher
      • 6x AIM-120 AMRAAM (4 on fuselage hardpoint, 2 on outboard wing hardpoint)
    • Gun Pods:
      • 1x 20mm gun pod on centreline hardpoint
    • Drop Tanks:
      • 3x 100u drop tanks on centreline and outboard hardpoint
      • 3x 150u drop tanks on centreline and outboard hardpoint
      • 3x 200u drop tanks on centreline and outboard hardpoint


     

  • F110F Strike Mamba - Download
    Spoiler

    F-110F Strike Mamba

    Modified F-110 airframe dedicated for ground attack missions, the Strike Mamba replaces the original APG-63 radar with APG-77v1 ATG radar and modified ordnance racks for carriage of air to ground weapons. The removal of onboard 20mm gun is remedied by capability of carrying a 30mm gun pod for ground strafing runs.

    Specification

    • Crew: 2
    • Length: 15,9m
    • Wingspan: 12,2m
    • Height: 4,8m
    • Empty Weight: 7,968kg
    • Loaded Weight: 20,385kg
    • Fuel capacity: 1600 unit
    • Powerplant: 2x J-404 afterburning turbofan
    • TWR: 0.85 dry / 1.30 wet

    Armament

    Guns:

    • none internally

    Hardpoints: 13 with a capacity of – and provisions to carry combinations of:

    • Bombs:
      • 3x CBU-87 cluster bombs on outboard and centreline hardpoint
      • 6x Mk 82 bombs on dedicated fuselage hardpoints
      • TER with 3x Mk 82 on each outboard wing hardpoint
      • MER with 6x Mk 82 on each outboard wing hardpoint
    • Rockets:
      • 2x Hydra-19 rocket launcher on inboard wing hardpoint
      • 2x S-8KOM rocket launcher on inboard wing hardpoint
    • Missiles:
      • 4x AIM-9 Sidewinder on dedicated launchers
    • Gun Pods:
      • 1x 20mm gun pod on centreline hardpoint
      • 1x 30mm gun pod on centreline hardpoint
    • Drop Tanks:
      • 3x 100u drop tanks on centreline and outboard hardpoint
      • 3x 150u drop tanks on centreline and outboard hardpoint
      • 1x 200u drop tanks on centreline hardpoint

     

  • EF110G Wild Mamba - Download
    Spoiler

    EF-110G Wild Mamba

    As an F-110 variant dedicated to SEAD/DEAD and electronic warfare missions, the Wild Mamba has its internal cannon replaced by ECM jamming equipment and has dedicated launchers for HARM missiles on its outboard hardpoint

    Specification

    Crew: 2
    Length: 15,9m
    Wingspan: 12,2m
    Height: 4,8m
    Empty Weight: 8,278kg
    Loaded Weight: 19,672kg
    Fuel capacity: 1600 unit
    Powerplant: 2x J-404 afterburning turbofan
    TWR: 0.88 dry / 1.35 wet

    Armament

    Guns:

    • none internally

    Hardpoints: 11 with a capacity of – and provisions to carry combinations of:

    • Bombs:
      • 4x CBU-87 cluster bombs on fuselage hardpoints
    • Missiles:
      • 4x AIM-9 Sidewinder on dedicated launchers
      • 2x AGM-88 HARM on outboard hardpoint
    • Avionics
      • 1x AN/ALQ-131 ECM Pod on centreline hardpoint
    • Drop Tanks:
      • 100u drop tanks on centreline hardpoint
      • 150u drop tanks on centreline hardpoint
      • 200u drop tanks on centreline hardpoint

     

  • RF110E Mamba - Download
    Spoiler

    RF-110E Mamba

    A stripped-down modified F-110E specially modified for reconnaissance missions by removal of onboard radar, internal guns, and fuselage hardpoints, followed by installation of additional fuel tanks and internal AN/AAQ-28 targeting pod in the nose

    Specification

    • Crew: 2
    • Length: 15,4m
    • Wingspan: 12,2m
    • Height: 4,8m
    • Empty Weight: 7,793kg
    • Loaded Weight: 20,147kg
    • Fuel capacity: 1600 unit
    • Powerplant: 2x J-404 afterburning turbofan
    • TWR: 0.86 dry / 1.31 wet

    Armament

    Guns:

    • none internally

    Hardpoints: 7 with a capacity of – and provisions to carry combinations of:

    • Missiles:
      • 4x AIM-9 Sidewinder on dedicated launchers
    • Drop Tanks:
      • 100u drop tanks on centreline and outboard hardpoint
      • 150u drop tanks on centreline and outboard hardpoint
      • 200u drop tanks on centreline and outboard hardpoint

Universal Key Features

  • Every craft have enough fuel for at least 1 hour flying time (measured with KER)
  • Every craft use RCS key to toggle afterburners
  • BDA AI flight control module for every craft is calibrated to loiter at 8000m altitude, 200m/s airspeed
  • BDA Weapon Manager and onboard cannons/machineguns for every craft is set at 500m gun range for realistic dogfighting
Edited March 6, 2020 by DIMASARM
